thread.title: NYMSuits Announces Arrival of 2016 Fashion Line
thread.title_full: NYMSuits Announces Arrival of 2016 Fashion Line

author: Marketing
title: NYMSuits Announces Arrival of 2016 Fashion Line
text:
New York Man Suits, a family owned and operated business since 1988, is proud to announce the arrival of their 2016 fashion line. With two prime locations in Staten Island, the fine tailored clothing company is renowned for their affordable pricing and quality customer service. Their two physical locations, as well as their online website, offer a varied selection of suits for men and boys, with their new fashion line expanding the business’ collection to compete with the world’s biggest fine-clothing competitors. NYMSuit’s latest fashion-line release boasts a plethora of new and world-renowned designers. The company now offers labels such as Calvin Klein, Ralph Lauren, Nicole Miller, DKNY, Michael Kors and Andrew Fezza. Popular designers such as Tommy Hilfiger, Kenneth Cole, Enrico Garcia, J. Matthews, Donald Trump and Robert Lewis are also available. Their varied product catalog, which has grown tremendously through the years, features a level of selection that is matched only by the largest companies, for a fraction of the cost.
Renowned for their competitive pricing, NYMSuit’s catalog features the finest assortment of clothing, including suits, dress shirts and tops, shoes, pants, ties and accessories. Having started their business with a small shop on 5th Avenue in Brooklyn, NYMSuit has emerged as one of the industry’s premier fine clothing providers, catering to customers worldwide for events of all occasions. Customers seeking quality support are sure to find the assistance they need, whether in-store or online, with representatives available to provide suggestions and/or recommendations.
As more and more fine-clothing stores continue to emerge over the coming years, NYMSuits aims to continue their dominance of the industry with a level of quality, affordability and service that has thus far remain unrivaled. With the arrival of their 2016 fashion line, the company continues their efforts to offer only the most popular, trending labels.
Customers in need of a suit are urged to check out their store or website, today, to see what new, luxurious items are now available. Featuring weekly specials, a clearance center, and only the finest labels, customers are sure to find what they’re looking for at a price that can’t be beat.
